 We are seeking a proactive and experienced ServiceNow Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of the ServiceNow platform, with hands\\-on experience designing, configuring, and developing custom solutions that drive efficiency and streamline business processes

* Design, develop, and implement solutions on the ServiceNow platform across various modules (ITSM, ITOM, HRSD, CSM, etc.).
* Customize ServiceNow applications and facilitate the rollout of new applications and modules.
* Develop custom workflows, business rules, UI policies, client scripts, and integrations.

* Create and maintain technical documentation, including architecture diagrams, solution designs, and deployment procedures.
* Implement and support integrations between ServiceNow and third\\-party platforms using REST/SOAP APIs, MID servers, and other technologies.
* Participate in platform upgrades and ensure compatibility of customizations.

* Stay current with new features and best practices related to the ServiceNow platform.



  





**Experience:** 



* 5\\+ years of experience as a ServiceNow Developer in a professional setting.

* Hands\\-on experience with ServiceNow integrations using REST and SOAP APIs.
* Understanding of Agile/Scrum development practices.
* ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) required; additional certifications (e.g., CIS\\-ITSM, CAD) are a plus.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work across business and technical teams.
